item.title: This forum is so weird to navigate
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

So apparently scrolling was broken all along by some theme tweaks Tom made on the previous forum and I copied over to this one:

Discourse Meta ‚Äì 22 Aug 16

Scrolling does not work on some topics with CSS body height set to 100%

My users and I are having a strange issue on our discourse instance, scrolling with the mouse wheel, or with the browser scrollbar, or with ‚Äòj‚Äô will not load more replies to a topic, no matter how fast or slow it seems. The only way to see more...

Reading time: 1 mins üïë Likes: 5 ‚ù§

I got rid of those, and now everything just works. It also seems faster and more responsive, make sure to do a hard refresh to see the changes, and let me know if there are more bugs!

Read full topic

item.title: This forum is so weird to navigate
item.dc:creator: @stCky stCky
item.description:
@stCky wrote:

After a couple of days of browsing, I can say this software is painful.

It‚Äôs handy if you like to browse forums by latest posts, which I do for forums that aren‚Äôt so busy, otherwise I‚Äôm just flat out not used to some behaviours, such as:

  • It‚Äôs currently showing unread old posts for me although I‚Äôve read every post in the thread
  • It doesn‚Äôt load new posts on scroll. When I reach the bottom of this thread, the latest post isn‚Äôt displayed and I have to click on the date/timeline thingo on the right to jump to the latest shit‚Ä¶hard to know where you are/what page you‚Äôre on, in a thread.

Also I wasn‚Äôt too keen on the fact I‚Äôm receiving e-mail about the site when I hadn‚Äôt actually ‚Äúactivated‚Äù (reset password) my account yet‚Ä¶

Read full topic
